paywall.title: Luxor Fitness Premium
paywall.subtitle: Your personal AI trainer
paywall.feature2: Personalized nutrition plans tailored to your goals
paywall.feature6: Access to all exercises with video
paywall.bestValue: Best value - pay for 8 months, get 12
paywall.legalText: Subscription renews automatically unless canceled 24 hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to your {{platform}} account when you confirm the purchase. You can manage and cancel your subscription in your account settings after purchase.
paywall.purchaseSuccessMessage: Thank you for subscribing to Luxor Fitness Premium.
paywall.noPurchasesMessage: No previous purchases found associated with your account.

initialTour.slide1Text: Your personal AI trainer. We'll help you achieve your fitness goals.
initialTour.slide2Text: Create workout plans tailored to your level, equipment and goals.
initialTour.slide3Text: Generate nutrition plans that adjust to your needs and preferences.

home.content1: This is your main dashboard. Here you'll see a summary of your daily activities.
home.content2: Here you'll see today's scheduled workout. Tap to see exercises and start your session.
home.content3: Check your daily calorie and macro goals. Tap to log your meals.
home.content4: If you need help anytime, tap the help button (?) to see all tutorials.

workout.content1: Here you can create and manage your workout plans. Let's explore the main features.
workout.content2: Tap this button to generate a personalized plan with artificial intelligence or design a manual one.
workout.content3: If you're a personal trainer, here you can manage your clients, assign plans, and track their progress.
workout.content4: All your saved plans will appear here. You can activate the one you want to use, edit it, or delete it.

nutrition.content1: This is your nutrition center. Here you can view and manage your meal plans.
nutrition.content2: Tap here to generate a personalized nutrition plan based on your goals.
nutrition.content3: View and follow your meal plan for the entire week.

customPlan.content1: Welcome to the custom plan creator! Here you'll design your workout routine step by step.
customPlan.content2: Tap here to give your workout plan a custom name.
customPlan.content3: This dropdown lets you navigate between your plan's weeks. Tap it to see options to add, duplicate, or delete weeks.
customPlan.content4: Each card represents a training day. Here you'll see the day's name and the exercises you add.
customPlan.content5: Tap the pencil icon to open the day and add or modify that day's exercises.
customPlan.content6: If you want to delete an entire day with all its exercises, use the red trash icon.
customPlan.content7: Use this button to add more training days to the current week. You can have as many days as you need.
customPlan.content8: When you're done designing your plan, tap "Save Plan". You can activate it immediately or leave it as a draft to edit later.
customPlan.content9: You now know all the tools! Design your perfect plan. Remember you can have multiple weeks with different exercises in each one.

progress.content1: Here you can track your physical progress over time.
progress.content2: View graphs of your weight, measurements and more evolution.
progress.content3: Log your daily metrics to keep accurate tracking.
progress.content4: Customize which metrics you want to see and track.

helpModal.title: Help Center
helpModal.description: Select a tutorial to watch it again:

metrics.content1: Here you can see your progress and health metrics. We'll show you the main features.
metrics.content2: Track your weight, body fat, and muscle mass over time.
metrics.content3: Check your steps, distance, calories burned, and other synced health data.
metrics.content4: You can choose which metrics to display by tapping the settings button in the top corner.

default: üî• Warm up properly before starting (5‚Äì10 min)

üéØ Keep your core engaged during all exercises
üìà Listen to your body and adjust intensity if needed
strength: üî• Warm up properly before starting (5‚Äì10 min)
üí™ Prioritize proper technique over heavy weight
‚è±Ô∏è Respect rest times for optimal recovery
üéØ Keep your core engaged during all exercises
üìà Increase weight only when you can complete all sets with good form
cardio: üî• Warm up with 5 minutes of light cardio

lowerBody: üî• Warm up with hip and knee mobility

üéØ Push through your heels when squatting
core: üî• Activate your core before each exercise

üìà Increase time under tension before adding weight
general: üí™ Maintain good technique in all exercises
üéØ Listen to your body and adjust if necessary

about.title: About
about.appDescription: Your personal AI fitness trainer. Personalized workout and nutrition plans to achieve your fitness goals.
about.medicalDisclaimerText: This app does NOT substitute professional medical advice. Consult with a healthcare professional before starting any exercise or nutrition program.

aiAdaptation.title: Adapt with AI
aiAdaptation.description: Describe how you want to adapt your workout. The AI will modify your current plan according to your specific needs.
aiAdaptation.placeholder: E.g., Don't include flat bench exercises because I have a shoulder injury
aiAdaptation.suggestion1: Don't include flat bench exercises because I have a shoulder injury
aiAdaptation.suggestion2: Change all leg exercises to bodyweight exercises
aiAdaptation.suggestion3: Reduce sets to 2 per exercise because I have limited time
aiAdaptation.suggestion4: Add more core and stability exercises
aiAdaptation.suggestion6: Include more stretching and mobility exercises
aiAdaptation.suggestion7: Change back exercises to no-weight alternatives
aiAdaptation.infoText: The AI will maintain the structure of your plan but will adapt exercises, sets, reps, and other aspects according to your instructions.
aiAdaptation.emptyPrompt: Please write an instruction to adapt your workout.
aiAdaptation.adaptError: Could not adapt the workout. Please try again.
